metadata.name: Until the End, I Have You
metadata.description:
Mixed media- original ceramic figure sculptures, handcrafted from earthenware clay, digital painting, and altered original photography. 

The last couple of years of pandemic and political turmoil in the world has left us feeling a bit apocalyptic. We love the serenity of this piece, with the red skies and pretty flowers. And yes, that is probably a meteor heading their way. Hence the title, an homage to our undying love.
